Kgopedi Oa Namane Lilokoe bụ onye ama ama na redio South Africa si Tembisa

Ọ bụ ya na-ahụbu maka Midday News na Africa Watch na ụlọ ọrụ redio azụmahịa kachasị ukwuu na South Africa, Metro FM. Ọ kwadokwara Africa Digest, mmemme ihe omume kwa ụbọchị nke na-ebido site na elekere ise nke uhuruchi,wee ruo na elekere asato  na Channel Africa Radio
Na June 2016, a mara ọkwa ya dị ka onye ga- akwado 12th Africa Movie Academy Awards.
